Replace.Text: [COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_AGENDA_BULL_MOOSE_DESCRIPTION]Wants to settle near high appeal tiles and build high appeal districts and wonders, and likes those who do the same. Dislikes anyone that embraces low appeal territory.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_AGENDA_BULL_MOOSE_NAME]The Bull Moose
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]You have my thanks.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]I can't say no to that.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DELEGATION_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]I welcome your delegation to the great United States of America.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]We are happy to open up our borders to your units.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]You have earned my respect. Shall we declare our friendship?
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_WAR_FROM_AI_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]I wanted to avoid this, you know, but your idea of peace left me no choice.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_WAR_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]If I must choose between righteousness and peace, I choose righteousness.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DEFEAT_FROM_AI_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]Congratulations. Instead of the United States of America, your nation will go far.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DELEGATION_FROM_AI_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]It’s good to see you. My diplomatic delegation should be arriving soon with some fresh-baked apple pies. I’m sure you’ll give them a warm welcome.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DENOUNCE_FROM_AI_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]I cannot abide a ruler without dignity, and the world must be made aware. (Denounces You)
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DENOUNCE_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]How dare you!
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]Welcome to the United States of America. If you conduct yourself well, you can consider us friends.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_NEAR_INITIATOR_POSITIVE_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]I can't say no to that.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_NO_MANS_INFO_EXCHANGE_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]I’d like to exchange information about our capitals; promote free trade between our nations, and all that.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_VISIT_RECIPIENT_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]We have a city nearby. Would you like to visit? I could show you the stuffed bears that are now so popular.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_GREETING_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]Go on, then.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_KUDO_EXIT_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ANY]I hear you’ve got some capital hiking over there.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_KUDO_EXIT_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]Thanks for keeping the peace on the continent. Bully for you!
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_KUDO_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_REASON_ANY](You have many high Appeal areas within your empire)
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_KUDO_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_REASON_ANY](You have kept the peace on his home continent)
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_ALLIANCE_FROM_AI_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]You have earned my respect. Shall we form an alliance?

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_AI_ACCEPT_DEAL_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]It is the duty of our nation to guard its own rights and interests. That work is done; let us go forth in peace.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_AI_REFUSE_DEAL_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]You cannot be serious!

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_FROM_AI_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]I protected the nation’s interests and guarded our rights. That work is done. Now, we can live in peace.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_AI_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]Will you allow our units to cross through your territory?
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]That is too bad.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]We are not interested at this time.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DELEGATION_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]We must decline.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]We are not interested at this time.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_EXIT_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ANY]We are defined by how we live with our surroundings. Remember that.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_EXIT_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]No man is above the law. It behooves you to remember that.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_REASON_ANY](You do not have enough high Appeal areas within your empire.)
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_REASON_ANY](You have attacked someone on his home continent.)

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_TOO_MANY_TROOPS_NEAR_ME_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_ANY]You march your troops so close to our borders that I am beginning to question your integrity.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_BULL_MOOSE_QUOTE]It is important to leave a better land for our descendants.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_CHAPTER_CAPSULE_BODY]Bull Moose Teddy knows there can be no greater issue than the conservation of breathtaking scenery, for America advances quickly when placing National Parks just outside its major cities.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_CHAPTER_DETAILED_BODY]Bull Moose Teddy favors the government choices of Classical Republic, Merchant Republic and then Democracy for they give him the Economic and Wildcard policy slots he needs as he heads toward a Culture Victory. With his Film Studio, National Park bonus, and the ability to earn [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture from Breathtaking tiles, Teddy is a cultural juggernaut, especially when possessing lands of great natural beauty.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_CHAPTER_CAPSULE_BODY]Rough Rider Teddy wields a big stick on his continent, but if you leave him alone he will stay peaceful.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_ROUGHRIDER_CHAPTER_DETAILED_BODY]Rough Rider Teddy Roosevelt enjoys +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength on his home continent and the ability to bring city-states under their sway through trade. He wants to expand rapidly across his continent while gaining the support of all nearby city-states. The Founding Fathers' civilization ability makes his choice of government important and can set him up for any victory type. His two post-Industrial unique units, including his favored Rough Riders, make him able to hit especially hard from the 20th Century onwards.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_T_ROOSEVELT_TITLE]Teddy Roosevelt (Bull Moose)
